original_text: And the two divisions of you, which come on duty in force on the Sabbath and guard the house of the Lord on behalf of the king,
korean_text: 안식일에 나가는 너희 중 두 대는 여호와의 성전을 주의하여 지켜 왕을 호위하되

sentences.original_text: And the two divisions of you,
which come on duty in force on the Sabbath
and guard the house of the Lord on behalf of the king,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 왕을 대신하여 주의 집을 지키는,
